reviewText: I work with the the guy named. Tru knudson he was the one in the remote villages. He was so embarrassed by this film. I always got a good time teasing him about it. The host Geo Beach is a complete douche.
My fiance is a hot stick lineman. This dvd was a christmas present. He watched it immediately and truly enjoyed it. If anyone knows of another similar movie please let me know.
I thought it would be longer, not so short of a film.  The movie although very descriptive isn't as long as I would of liked.
